data.text:
Commencement Coordinator

Elizabeth has focused her professional life on project management and event planning. In recent years, she managed the annual gift collection and silent auction for a school in Cambridge, MA. Prior to this, she worked for six years in the Meeting and Event Planning Department at the American Bar Association, both in their Judicial and Litigation Divisions. Earlier in her career, Elizabeth was part of the sales force team at the international medical publisher Georg Thieme Verlag where she traveled the country attending medical conference exhibitions.

Elizabeth received her Bachelor of Arts in Biology and Economics at Bates College in Maine. She joined the Tufts Trustees Office in April 2023.
